TopicTitle: A rescue kerbal contract ended because the stranded capsule blew up

Articles.Content:
Yes, that. Is there a time limit for those contracts now? The contract window claims the deadline is 4 years. I was approaching a stranded kerbal in an orbit half way to the Mun, I had matched speeds at about 1 km away and when I fired my engines to cut that distance, the capsule suddenly blew up.

Is that expected behaviour, a stock bug or maybe a bug caused by some mod?

Could be a stock bug.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117856-Random-Exploding-Space-Rendezvous

It may have been fixed in the latest patches.
Maybe. Well, at least it isn't some weird game mechanic nor, apparently, some mod
This should be fixed in the most recent version. It was a bug in the heating.

Only tangentially relevant, but I was just getting annoyed with the capsules left in orbit after rescue missions when I saw that Kerbal Inventory System gives you the ability to attach an explosive charge to something and blow it up.

I am *so* excited by this.
